snippet.title: The moment a Log4j maintainer realized the true scale of the crisis
snippet.description:
What happens when a bug in your project is so big you consider quitting open source altogether? Christian Grobmeier, a Log4j maintainer, recounts the dawning realization that the Log4Shell flaw could affect millions, if not billions, of applications worldwide.

#Log4j #Log4Shell #OpenSource
